introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: AR Automation respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you visit our website.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We may collect the following types of information:

items.personal: Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, and company name when you contact us or request our services
items.usage: Usage Data: Information about how you use our website, including pages visited, time spent, and navigation patterns
items.technical: Technical Data: IP address, browser type, device information, and cookie data

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use your information for the following purposes:

items.service: To provide and improve our services
items.communication: To communicate with you about inquiries, updates, and marketing (with your consent)
items.improvement: To analyze and improve our website performance and user experience
items.analytics: To understand user behavior through analytics (only with your consent)

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience. You can manage your cookie preferences at any time.

security.title: Data Storage and Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Your data is stored securely and retained only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy.

rights.title: Your Rights (GDPR)
rights.content: Under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the following rights:

access.title: Right to Access
access.description: You can request a copy of the personal data we hold about you

rectification.title: Right to Rectification
rectification.description: You can request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data

erasure.title: Right to Erasure
erasure.description: You can request deletion of your personal data ("right to be forgotten")

portability.title: Right to Data Portability
portability.description: You can request your data in a structured, commonly used format

objection.title: Right to Object
objection.description: You can object to processing of your data for certain purposes

restriction.title: Right to Restriction
restriction.description: You can request restriction of processing in certain circumstances

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us:

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new policy on this page with an updated "Last Updated" date.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Cookie Policy explains how AR Automation uses cookies and similar tracking technologies when you visit our website. This policy provides detailed information about the types of cookies we use, why we use them, and how you can control them.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device (computer, tablet, or mobile phone) when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to website owners. Cookies can be "persistent" or "session" cookies. Persistent cookies remain on your device after you close your browser, while session cookies are deleted when you close your browser.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUse.content: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, personalize content, and understand how our website is used. Cookies help us remember your preferences, provide relevant features, and ensure the website functions properly.

detailedList.title: Detailed Cookie Information
detailedList.content: Below is a comprehensive list of all cookies used on our website, including their purpose, duration, and provider information.

managing.title: Managing Your Cookie Preferences
managing.content: You can manage your cookie preferences at any time by clicking the button below. This will open our cookie settings where you can enable or disable different types of cookies.

browserSettings.title: Browser Cookie Settings
browserSettings.content: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. You can set your browser to refuse cookies or delete certain cookies. Please note that if you disable cookies, some features of our website may not function properly. To learn more about how to manage cookies in your browser, please refer to your browser's help documentation.
